meanings.definition: A person who creates abstract art.
meanings.sent1: The abstractionist painted colorful shapes on the canvas.
meanings.sent2: The museum featured works by various abstractionists.
meanings.sent3: The abstractionist accidentally spilled paint on their shoes while working.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was an abstractionist, creating vivid images from mere thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The abstractionist's studio was filled with inspiration and creativity.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of abstract art.
meanings.sent1: The gallery displayed an abstractionist painting with bold lines.
meanings.sent2: Her style was clearly abstractionist, focusing on shapes and colors.
meanings.sent3: The room felt strangely abstractionist with its minimalist decor.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts were like an abstractionist puzzle, challenging to decipher.
meanings.sent5: The music had an abstractionist quality, evoking emotions without words.

meanings.definition: The practice or theory of creating abstract art.
meanings.sent1: Studying abstractionism helps artists understand different techniques.
meanings.sent2: The book delved into the history of abstractionism in modern art.
meanings.sent3: The class debated the impact of abstractionism on traditional art forms.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a whirlwind of abstractionism, seeking new ways to express ideas.
meanings.sent5: The museum hosted a special exhibit on the evolution of abstractionism.
